passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > nav:nth-child(3) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(1) > h5
html > body > nav:nth-child(3) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(2) > h5
html > body > nav:nth-child(3) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(3) > h5
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > a:nth-child(1) > h5
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > a:nth-child(2) > h5
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > a:nth-child(6) > h5
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > a:nth-child(7) > h5
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > a:nth-child(8) > h5
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > a:nth-child(9) > h5
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div > div > div > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > nav > a:nth-child(1) > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > nav > a:nth-child(2) > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > nav > a:nth-child(3) > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > nav > a:nth-child(4) > h3
